```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
# Creazione del csv dal xlsx
# time <- write_csv(read_excel("../Time.xlsx", 51), "Time.csv")

medians <- time %>%
  select(array_length, Quick, Med, Heap) %>%
  gather(key = "algorithm", value = "med_time", -array_length)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = medians, aes(x = array_length)) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(y = med_time, color = algorithm)) +
  labs(y = "Execution time") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = scales::pretty_breaks(n = 10)) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = scales::pretty_breaks(n = 10)) +
  theme(legend.position = c(.10, .90), legend.background = element_rect(fill = "transparent"), legend.title=element_blank())
```
